body:
Hey guys! my name is Jono i do youtube and all sorts of things and Love the server and the community Just thought i'd let you all know :P
My youtube is https://www.youtube.com/user/InfernusJono incse you were wondering. :)

title: Hi i am Jono

replies.body:
Hello and welcome to Avicus! 
Some useful links:

Shop - avicus.net/shop
Forums - avicus.net/forums
Server Leaderboard (Here you can see the ranks of every player) - avicus.net/stats
Avicus TeamSpeak3 - Go to teamspeak3.com, download TeamSpeak, install it and once you open it, click the CONNECT button and type in: ts.avicus.net
Rules (Important) - avicus.net/rules
Staff members and map developers: avicus.net/staff

If you have any questions/problems, email support@avicus.net for help!

i hope to see you on the server sometime! :)

replies.body: Hey Jono! Hope to see you in game. (:

Nice name -_- xD

Cya around :)
